name: Pinyin
tagline: A simple python script to translate chinese to pinyin based on Mandarin.dat
body:
Pinyin
======

Translate chinese chars to pinyin based on Mandarin.dat

Install
-------

```bash
$ pip install pinyin
```

Usage
-----

```python
>>> import pinyin
>>> print pinyin.get('你 好')
nǐ hǎo

>>> print pinyin.get('你好', format="strip", delimiter=" ")
ni hao

>>> print pinyin.get('你好', format="numerical")
ni3hao3

>>> print pinyin.get_initial('你好')
n h
```

*format must be one of: numerical/diacritical/strip*
